website_summaries.verdict: Functionality doesn't have to be boring: this protective, anti-gravity iPhone case not only fits multiple models, but has style that goes on for days.
pros: Over a dozen different designs to choose
Keeps phone safe from bumps and falls no matter what the angle
Users love that it sticks to practically everything, and how good it looks doing it
Easy to keep clean, and sticky surface will regain adhesive properties
cons: The protective edges are somewhat larger than some other phone cases and add a bit of bulk

customer_reviews.title: Not antigravity
customer_reviews.text: Protects my phone great. When it comes to the antigravity part there’s a lot left to be desired. It’s better described as an anti slide case. It doesn’t stick like my old antigravity case did. It does ok on glass but not just a flat surface. Not sure if it’s the weight or the rounded corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No protection and falls apart like a cheap carnival prize
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about 4 months. Great sticking pose on clean surfaces. But after a while is stare to fall apart. I failed structural and caused me to drop my phone and crack the screen since it doesn’t offer much in the way of protection. A nice novelty but it ended up costing me $140 since my camera a mic broke as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after three months
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I loved this case. It's cute, does a great job of protecting the phone and the "sticky" feature is fun. However, after three months, the plastic around the side of the case separated from the back. So I can't recommend it. I think a phone case should last longer than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Not only was my case the wrong case, but it also didn’t fit my iPhone 8. It’s also NOT an antigravity case. So disappointed, I wasted my money. Do not recommend, false advertising! It deserves 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. It only sticks to my desk. That would be great but I don’t need it to stick to my desk🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Myisha Washington

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing the suction works and I love the thick corners to protect my screen. Definitely recommend 💞 I also bought a pop socket to match it and it looks so good
customer_reviews.author: Tamiya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute case and fits my phone really well! Sticks well to almost anything too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this case. I’ve had it for about 4 months now and it has fallen apart at the seams where the back and side connects. This case has protected my phone and prevented scratches/ breaks in the glass and it’s been dropped many times. It’s cool that it can stick to things but it’s limited what it can stick to and it’s not going to stay on very long stick to the mirror. I find I really like the stickiness when I put the phone down on a table It won’t get knocked off as easily. I guess for the price I shouldn’t have expected much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Silva

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! I didn't think it was actually going to do what it claimed, but it really sticks to all smooth surfaces. I walked around the house testing it on everything and it really did stick to everything!!! (except the interior walls of course) Everything smooth like mirrors, doors, cabinets, windows, ovens, etc... it sticks to. Highly recommend if you cook, do makeup, or take selfies!!! The print on the case is very clear too. Not all pixilated like most are. The edges are also a bit larger than most other cases, but it feels like if I dropped it from any angle it would survive the fall!
customer_reviews.author: alyzee

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: No good at all it didn’t stick on my wall more than two minutes. I’m going to request a refund for this sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this case!! It works and I use it for videos in the morning. I LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pattycakes

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Cute, Protects your phone but doesn’t stay stuck on the mirror very long
customer_reviews.author: Desiree M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: No slip which is nice but it started to crack not long after use (back and side separated). Only got 2 months of use and I’m gentle on my phone. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: iPhone 6/6S/7/8 Case, TiTiShark Premium Anti Gravity Protective Case [Hands-Free Case], Butterfly Design Interior Printed Clear Case for Apple iPhone 6/6S/7/8
feature_bullets: STICKS TO ALMOST ANYTHING … glass, mirrors, tiles, metal, whiteboard, cabinets, leather, & other smooth flat non-porous surfaces. Wherever you are, you’ll find something to stick it to.
HARDLY ANY EXTRA BULK … our slimline case barely adds noticeable size to stay “Bulk Free” in your pocket. Easily maintain access to all the main buttons & ports.
EASY TO CLEAN … sticks but isn’t sticky… Whenever a little lint or dust gathers, wipe easily away with a damp cloth. No problem.
SELF HEALS MINOR DAMAGE … scratched the back. In a short while, our suction plate repairs itself to look as new again. Sticks just as good as it did before.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars30 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
